title: Rubio lends hand to Hungary’s Orban as he faces tough election
summary_full: “We want this country to do well,” Marco Rubio said during a visit to Budapest, “especially as long as you’re the prime minister.”
summary_public: “We want this country to do well,” Marco Rubio said during a visit to Budapest, “especially as long as you’re the prime minister.”

HU.label: negative
HU.evidence: Rubio lends hand to Hungary’s Orban as he faces tough election
